title: itcoinBlockchain
author: itcoinBlockchain
created_time: March 09, 2023, 04:50:01 PMLast edit: March 09, 2023, 05:36:32 PM by itcoinBlockchain
content: Hello,Wow! What a helpful community Got it.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Once your payment is confirmed, you have to go back to the Copper Membership page and activate it.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Are you sure that your transaction has at least 1 confirmation? Also, you have to select Copper member rank, afaik its not automatically set for you.QuoteOnce your transaction has 1 confirmation, revisit this page and then use the form which will appear in order to wear your new membership. Your transaction will not be accepted until it has 1 confirmation. Bitcoin network fees and exchange/wallet withdrawal fees will not count toward your payment.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: itcoinBlockchain on March 09, 2023, 04:50:01 PMI am missing my Copper Membership that was paid for. You should first double check if receiving address was correct, but what fees you used when you sent your coins?Mempool is really full right now (blame it on ordinals) with many unconfirmed txn, so you either wait until transaction is confirmed or you pay more fees if you used RBF in your transaction.You can check mempool state on mempool.space or any similar websites.

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Quote from: itcoinBlockchain on March 09, 2023, 04:50:01 PMI am missing my Copper Membership that was paid for.Don't worry, if you sent the btc to the correct address [as shown when you pay] then you only need to wait for at least 1 confirmation before you can continue with the next step. Please be patient, but you must make sure you have sent to the right address.Maybe the confirmation is bit long because the mempool is stuck as dkbit98 has explained. 40 satoshi per byte is the recommended fee, but if you are using wallet that supports RBF, then you can pay higher fee to get faster confirmations.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: You should be patient, it takes time before bitcoin transaction got at least 1 confirmation. Anyhow, i can see already your copper Â membership tag, maybe you can lock the thread now by tapping the "lock topic" in the lower left of this thread.

comments.author: UserU
comments.body: Quote from: nakamura12 on March 10, 2023, 06:21:21 AMDid you check if the address that you sent the payment is the exact address that you can see in the copper membership page?. If not then we can't help you get the funds back but if it's the right one then ot should be okay and go back to copper membership page to activate it or set the copper membership. Once you have done it then you can see copper membership in your profile.Well, he's proudly wearing it now

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Quote from: UserU on March 10, 2023, 07:02:22 AMWell, he's proudly wearing it now  Couldn't agree more. It seems OP finally found it and wear it.

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: As you have already now Copper membership on your profile I would ask you to lock the topic as there's no point in further streching and derailing the topic.It would be better as you have also received why it was not updated before hand.If you are not aware how to lock it then you would find the options of lock topic  at the bottom of the thread as you are topic creator.

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Quote from: aysg76 on March 11, 2023, 03:00:02 PMAs you have already now Copper membership on your profile I would ask you to lock the topic as there's no point in further streching and derailing the topic.It would be better as you have also received why it was not updated before hand.If you are not aware how to lock it then you would find the options of lock topic  at the bottom of the thread as you are topic creator.Of course, it is the best advice when the problem is solved.But I don't think it's good to edit the content on the thread when the problem is solved. The OP shouldn't have to do that because I think this thread is worth referencing when other newbies ask about the same problem. Thread content should be persisted, that is my suggestion even if the problem is solved. Simply lock the thread and leave one appreciative reply to anyone who helps.

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: Quote from: itcoinBlockchain on March 09, 2023, 04:50:01 PMWow! What a helpful community Bitcointalk has always been known for this, you aren't the first neither will you be the last to enjoy this benefit, the community is so positioned to have come to each everyone of us level and standard while maintaining it reputation as well with nothing wrongly pass acrossed, I believe you have your own reasons for obtaining this and wish you rightly apply the use as required appropriately.

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: Quote from: itcoinBlockchain on March 09, 2023, 04:50:01 PM...Editing your entire post makes it difficult to follow the conversation and what other users are replying to. Alternatively you can edit in the appreciation text without removing the initial content or you can make a new reply.I would recommend the former, but do not think too much about it.- Jay -
